LanguageData.AsteroidGreen.label: green tiberium asteroid
LanguageData.AsteroidGreen.letterText:
An unusual meteorite has crashed nearby and made a crater.

There seems to be some strange crystals poking out of it, and a few have broken off and scattered around the site.

Be careful, the substance could be dangerous!
LanguageData.AsteroidBlue.label: blue tiberium asteroid
LanguageData.AsteroidBlue.letterText:
An unusual meteorite has crashed nearby and made a crater.

There seems to be some strange crystals poking out of it, and a few have broken off and scattered around the site.

Be careful, the substance could be dangerous!
LanguageData.AsteroidMeteor.label: tiberium meteor
LanguageData.AsteroidMeteor.letterText:
An unusual meteorite has crashed nearby.

There seems to be some strange crystals poking out of it.

Be careful, the substance could be dangerous!
LanguageData.TiberiumShard.label: tiberium shard
LanguageData.TiberiumShard.letterText: An unusual type of shard has dropped. It's spreading red crystals around itself.\n\nBe careful, the substance could be dangerous!
LanguageData.BlossomTree.label: blossom tree
LanguageData.BlossomTree.letterText: A cloud of unknown gas has passed the map and mutated a tree. Be careful around it!
LanguageData.VeinholeArrival.label: Veinhole Arrival
LanguageData.VeinholeArrival.letterText: A veinhole monster appeared on your map!
LanguageData.IonStormIncident.label: Ion storm
LanguageData.IonStormIncident.letterText:
An Ion storm has begun.

The intense radiation will shut down all electrical devices.

Be careful about Tiberium spread.
